pullrequest.title: Fix for DART6 which works like the one for bullet in pull request #2654

content.html:
we should enable the test for dart:

diff -r 8ce5d38b1f1f test/integration/contacts_update.cc
--- a/test/integration/contacts_update.cc   Mon May 08 09:53:17 2017 +1000
+++ b/test/integration/contacts_update.cc   Tue May 09 16:36:29 2017 -0700
@@ -35,15 +35,6 @@
 //////////////////////////////////////////////////
 void ContactsUpdate::TestTwoSpheres(const std::string &_physicsEngine)
 {
-  if (_physicsEngine == "dart")
-  {
-    gzwarn << "Disabling TestTwoSpheres for dart.\n";
-    // Take the DART test back in as soon as this fix has been merged:
-    // https://bitbucket.org/JenniferBuehler/gazebo
-    // branch "dart-6-fix-like-PR-2654"
-    return;
-  }
-
   this->Load("worlds/empty.world", true, _physicsEngine);

   // Load the spheres into the world.
